questions.question: Which algorithm is used to find the maximum flow in a flow network?
What is the time complexity of the Ford-Fulkerson algorithm?
Which algorithm is used to solve the traveling salesman problem (TSP) for a weighted graph?
Which algorithm is used for topological sorting in a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG)?
Which of the following algorithms can be used to detect negative weight cycles in a graph?
Which algorithm is used to find the longest path in a Directed Acyclic Graph (DAG)?

answers.text: Topological Sort followed by Dynamic Programming

questions.question: Which of the following is the primary use of the A* (A-star) algorithm?

answers.text: Finding the shortest path in a weighted graph

questions.question: What is the main advantage of the A* (A-star) algorithm over Dijkstra's algorithm?

answers.text: It uses a heuristic to guide the search
It only works with undirected graphs
It finds the minimum spanning tree
It is faster than Dijkstra's in all cases

questions.question: Which algorithm is used to find the minimum cost flow in a network flow problem?
Which of the following is a limitation of the Bellman-Ford algorithm?

answers.text: It cannot handle graphs with negative weight cycles
It only works on undirected graphs
It is slower than Dijkstra's in all cases
It requires all edge weights to be positive
